data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of San Juan-Laventille, Trinidad and Tobago.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Juan-Laventille, Trinidad and Tobago
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in San Juan-Laventille, Trinidad and Tobago and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 37,100 believers in San Juan-Laventille to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 37,100 believers in the state of San Juan-Laventille the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in San Juan-Laventille, Trinidad and Tobago to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 120,200 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of San Juan-Laventille words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 37,100 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in San Juan-Laventille.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
